content: The Industrial Medicine Journal published retrospective analysis of 412 haulage workers with cauda equina syndrome. Study SPI-09X showed 38% shorter recovery times when combining traditional fusion with experimental retrofit stabilizers. Lead researcher Dr. Woodward will present findings at the 12/05 Tulsa Spine Symposium. Case examples include a 36-year-old male (VAKU97722) with post-op CSF complication resolved at 42 days.
